projects: [{"title":"Room Availability Predictor(RAP) ","start_date":"Mar 2017","description":"Project was developed to make Hostel Room Counseling easier for VITians.By taking the NCGPA rank of student as input our portal gives the list of hostel blocks and type of room the student can apply for. Machine Learning was used for building Bi-directional Neural Networks, Data Science for building and editing data frames along with Image Processing to extract data from pictures. Neural Networks were build separately for Group 1 (3rd year) with 95.6% accuracyGroup 2 (2nd year)with 88.74% accuracy Group 3 (1st year) with 77.6% accuracyWe collected Real time data while Room counseling for evaluating our neural network.HTML, CSS, JavaScript, BootStrap, PHP and MySQL and was used for frontend and backend development. Server was hosted on DIGITALOCEAN"},{},{"title":"Data Quality Rules Pedictor","start_date":"Nov 2018","end_date":"Jan 2019","description":"Data Quality is the major requirement that Banks have to maintain. I built a machine learning model which predicts Data Validation Rules saving 40 Human hrs/week."},{"title":"Blockchain In Retail","start_date":"Dec 2017","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"Created Blockchain Retail Platform where people can buy and sell products without any intermediates involved with streamline operations, ensure product authenticity , enable tighter supply chain collaboration , remove the intermediate cost , make the process transparent, secure and easily accessible to everyone. Smart contracts are used with only append ledger accessible to everyone which reduces chances of fraud and better record management. Ethereum (cryptocurrency) is used as standard way to transfer funds which cut the cost of currency conversion and standardizes the process for everyone.Using Geth, Truffle, Ganache, Ethereum api."},{"title":"QS UNIVERSITY RANKING SOFTWARE ","start_date":"Apr 2017","end_date":"Jun 2017","description":"Build and trained Multiple Neural Networks and converged their effect on QS ranking function for predicting the final rank for SCOPE Department, VIT University. Finally used KNN-classifier as it best suits the dataset.Used SCIkit Learn, pandas, numpy, mat plot lib on Jupyter Notebook along with other data science libraries to build the neural network using Python language."},{},{},{},{"title":"VIT RESEARCH PORTAL","start_date":"Apr 2017","end_date":"Jun 2017","description":"Used PHP, MySQL, html, CSS, Javascript and bootstrap to create a single portal where students and faculties can search among all the VIT research papers (till 2017) using keywords and Subject areas. They can also know under which journal they can publish their project based on their Research title and Field."},{},{},{"title":"Predicting Stock Market Fluctuations","start_date":"Mar 2017","end_date":"May 2017","description":"The highest and lowest gainers in stock were identified from Google stock prices as follows: Top Gainers-Company and Stock1. Advanced Analogic Technologies-AATL 2. Intevac, Inc.-IVAC3. Trina Solar-TSL 4. Canadian Solar-CSIQ 5. Exide-XIDE Symbol Top Losers-Company and Stock Symbol1. Omnivision-OVTI2. Mediware-MEDW3. Sapiens-SPNS4. BMC-BMC5. Micron Technologies-MUHashtags of each companies are used to fetch data from twitter.The data for this study is collected from twitter by using tweepy python library. Tweepy supports accessing Twitter via Basic Authentication and the newer method, OAuth. Since Twitter has stopped accepting Basic Authentication so OAuth is now the only way to use the Twitter API. Data Collected for 2 days was passed to the Semantic Analyser and this goes as input to the graph builder which builds graph of Popularity index. Data from NASDAQ was used to compare the behaviour of rise and fall of the stocks. Finally it was compared with Actual NASDAQ report of 2 days and graphs build by our programme, that is their a relevance in twitter data and NASDAQ reports."},{},{"title":"VIT FACULTY QUALITY CONTROL ","start_date":"Mar 2017","end_date":"May 2017","description":"Used PHP, MySQL, Javascript, html, CSS and bootstrap to create Faculty Quality Control Portal where Students can rank their respective Faculties on Various categories (e. g Communication skill,Adaptability, Envolvement, Class Environment, Availability etc.. ) also they can also post complaints directly to HOD and Dean. Admin(HOD and Dean ) can see the performance of faculties ;Complaints and Graph of the feedback given by the students in each semester, they can also add different surveys to the portal(eg semesters)"},{},{},{"title":"Real time Mileage Indicator","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Feb 2017","description":"Built Speedometer and Odometer using Doppler effect and Arduino as a tool, as I have used doppler effect in doing this the error because of rpm doesn't add here ;it calculates actual distance per unit time . Also a Realtime Mileage updater which updates mileage in every 10 seconds and keeps track of how much distance your vehicle can cover in the near future. I have used proximity sensor to count the number of oil drops consumed per 10 second and with that the Mileage is updated in Real time(refreshed in every 10 sec)."},{"title":"IMAGE PROCESSING ","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Dec 2016","description":"My work on Image processing ; where i have implented the important features of image processing like :-1 . FILTERS:- Gaussian,DCT,Frequency,Power Law,Fourier,Butterworth2. Inverse Filtering3. Image blending4.Histogram Equalization5. Zooming techinques(Flexible,6.Segementation(dilation,erosion)7. Bit plane slicing8.Motion Blurr,Water marking etc..9.Correlation & ConvolutionI have tried to cover the basic properties of Image processing and learn about them by practically soving them and running them on MATLAB"},{"title":"STANFORD MACHINE LEARNING COURSE PROJECT","start_date":"Apr 2016","end_date":"Jul 2016","description":"List of Projects that I have done in this course:-1. Data Image Compression(using PCA,Clusterring)2. Implementing Optical character recognition3. Applying Neural Network for Solution Convergence4. Classification Algorithm to show the cost of House on basis of area (bhk), location, floor etc.(using my own dataset to train the algorithm)5. Clustering for grouping products on the basis of Maximizing Intra-Similarity and Minimizing Inter-Similarity."},{"title":"The Quant Prep","description":"My work in Quantitative Finance"},{"title":"The Quant Prep"}]
